hint: Focus on pushing filters early into CTEs, converting implicit joins to explicit JOINs with date dimension pre-filtering, and applying safe predicate pushdown without major restructuring.
Isolate selective date and dimension filters into materialized CTEs, restructure the main query to use explicit JOINs with pre-filtered CTEs, and decorrelate subqueries for better planning.
Pre-filter ALL dimension tables and fact tables into separate materialized CTEs, then join. Decompose the self-join pattern in the final query to compute aggregations once.
Transform the INTERSECT operations to EXISTS or IN subqueries, restructure the cross_items CTE to reduce set operations, and apply structural transforms to the year comparison logic.
